# `math cosh` for [math](/commands/categories/math.md)

<div class='command-title'>Returns the hyperbolic cosine of the number.</div>

## Signature

```> math cosh {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input        | output      |
| ------------ | ----------- |
| list\<number\> | list\<float\> |
| number       | float       |
## Examples

Apply the hyperbolic cosine to 1
```nu
> 1 | math cosh
1.5430806348152435
```
